title: Peerless Immortal - Novel Updates
author: 王小蛮
description:
“Why are we alive? To gain knowledge. The more we know, the more colorful our life becomes and have fewer regrets to live with.” 

That was the motto of an Earthling, Ding Hao. With that, he embarked on a journey to become a Peerless Immortal. 

>
